meta.title: Contract #009: Static Noise
meta.description: CIVIL UNREST: Timeline corruption detected. Deduce order of events without complete timestamps.
meta.journal: The riot wasn't spontaneous. The 'Glass Break' sensor triggered BEFORE the alarm, but the police log was edited to justify the tear gas deployment. They broke the window themselves.

nodes.text: 22:00 - Social Media: Crowd gathering peacefully at Block 4.
--:-- - Alarm System: Perimeter Breach Alert (East Entrance).
22:05 - Police Radio: 'Officers under fire! Requesting support.'
22:15 - Hospital Admission: 12 civilians treated for CS Gas inhalation.
